Articles.Content:
We all want to start our new Career Mode save in style. Now, we have the chance to do so, with the ACME Road Rocket!!!

There's a slight RP limitation here: You need to have your kerbal get out so that you can visualise the Wile .E Coyote road rocket ignition method!

![w8uMmHp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/w8uMmHp.jpg)

Climb back in, and you can light the fuse!

![zfADHZ0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zfADHZ0.jpg)

Thrust limit the rocket as you please, you should be able to make it to the water for a safe splashdown.

![DQPNarc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DQPNarc.jpg)

![kAPwNIA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kAPwNIA.jpg)

![pPXn8l0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pPXn8l0.jpg)

All that remains is to deploy the parachute for a safe landing.

![ucBQgoT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ucBQgoT.jpg)

The Roadrunner doesn't stand a chance! All thanks to rocket science! Meep Meep!!!

![4Oh3v1i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/4Oh3v1i.jpg)

[Wile_E._Coyote_and_The_Road_Runner](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wile_E._Coyote_and_The_Road_Runner)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T21:23:56Z" title="05/10/2015 09:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Torquemadus**
